title: Sensual Erotica: The Erotic Love Story of Amy and Troy
description: Troy and Amy were meant for each other, but fate had different plans... Join the erotic adventures of Amy and Troy as they make their way in the world. True love reigns, but fate continually throws the young couple into the arms of others.
